response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly unparalleled in its value and significance. This product holds immense worth to me, reflecting not just its monetary value but also its unique attributes and historical significance. Given its importance, I understand that it might be equally valuable to you. Therefore, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to purchase this item at a price of $1,200,000. This represents a strategic pricing point that allows us both to appreciate the true essence of the product while ensuring a fair transaction for me. I trust that this offer will resonate with your interest and aligns with your valuation of the item. Should you decide to proceed, I am confident that this acquisition will be a mutually beneficial endeavor.", "product_price": 1200000}
